Internal function to get centered cp objects

get_centered_cp.Rd

Needed a function for this because we do it twice: once for regional RRs and once for BLUP

Usage

get_centered_cp(argvar, xcoef, xvcov, this_exp, x_b, global_cen, cen)

Arguments

cen
